name: Type of Payment
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="payment_type"
	label="Type of Payment"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_payment_type"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=payment_types&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=payment_type.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=payment_type.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select Type of Payment"
	titleNew="New Payment Type"
	titleEdit="Edit Payment Type"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="The type of payment"
	hint="Select a Payment Type"
/>
